titleStmt.title: The true account of the behaviour and confession of Alice Millikin who was burnt in Smithfield on Wednesday the 2d. of June, 1686. For high-treason, in clipping the Kings coin.
titleStmt.author: Smith, Samuel, 1620-1698. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by E. Mallet, next door to Mr. Shipton's Coffee-house at Fleet-Bridge,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Samuel Smith, ordinary.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
